TEXT.TITLE: LODGISTIX <LDGX.O> OPENS OFFICE IN CANADA
TEXT.BODY: Lodgistix Inc said it is expanding distribution in Canada of its automated property management systems for hotel and resorts with the opening of a new ssales office in Calgary, Alberta. Reuter
